scripts.start: npm run build && db:update && node --inspect=0.0.0.0 dist/index.js
scripts.docker:db:redo: npm run docker:db:migrate:rollback && npm run docker:db:migrate:latest && npm run docker:db:seed
scripts.db:update: npm run db:migrate:latest && npm run db:prisma:pull && npm run db:prisma:generate && npm run db:types
scripts.docker:build: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run build
scripts.docker:test: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run test
scripts.docker:db:update: docker exec -it database_backend npm run db:update
scripts.docker:db:migrate:latest: docker exec -it database_backend npm run db:migrate:latest
scripts.docker:db:seed: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run db:seed
scripts.docker:db:prisma:pull: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run db:prisma:pull
scripts.docker:db:prisma:generate: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run db:prisma:generate
scripts.docker:db:types: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run db:types
scripts.docker:db:migrate:up: docker exec -it database_backend npm run db:migrate:up
scripts.docker:db:migrate:down: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npx knex --knexfile ./src/knexfile.ts migrate:down
scripts.docker:db:migrate:rollback: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npx knex --knexfile ./src/knexfile.ts migrate:rollback --all
scripts.docker:db:console: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.docker:db:prisma:studio: docker compose --project-name tripsit-dev-apps exec database_backend npm run db:prisma:studio
